title: Rainy city street with parked cars and a crosswalk, the ego vehicle is moving slowly and braking frequently.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy day, passing parked cars and a crosswalk.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to maintain control on the slippery road. It brakes frequently to avoid potential hazards, such as pedestrians or other vehicles that may suddenly appear.
